<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search MediaWiki tags"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/engine/mediawiki/tags"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Searches Wikipedia for a term and returns top results with Product Ontology links.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"searchTerm","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"numResults","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Results returned","content":{"application/json":{"example":{"http://www.productontology.org/id/Apple":"Fruit description..."}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
